name: dioxus-maplibre-e2e
description: E2E tests using MapLibre's official render test infrastructure

scripts.test: cd maplibre-gl-js && xvfb-run -a npm run test-render
scripts.test:filter: cd maplibre-gl-js && xvfb-run -a npm run test-render --
scripts.setup: npm run install-maplibre && npm run build-maplibre
